title: New: jumpswim❀ – Fall Out Of Love (Feat. Ninna Lundberg)
content:
Recorded between Copenhagen and London, jumpswim❀ and Ninna Lundberg’s debut collaboration, Do For Love, a reworking of Bobby Caldwell’s classic, quite rightly earned them numerous online plaudits.

Their second offering, almost a year down the line, is another glitchy yet vocally perfect number. Early days for the two of them, but I’d quite happily listen to an album’s worth of collaborations.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
